text: Prokash Karmakar (; 1933 - 24 February 2014) was a preeminent Indian artist and painter. His work is in the permanent collection of a number of museums and galleries all over India, including the National Gallery of Modern Art in New Delhi. He was born in Kolkata, West Bengal. Karmakar died from an illness on 24 February 2014. He was 81 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Indian painters Category:People from Kolkata
title: Prokash Karmakar
